alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 16 at 7:45PM CDT until March 16 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL VAN ZANDT COUNTY... At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Grand Saline, or 10 miles west of Mineola, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Van Zandt County, including the following locations... Oakland, Jones and Pruitt. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
